entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023
